name: Colors
overview: A Columns clone where you can only rotate through colors. It was created by Keith Johnson and released in 1992. The game features two game modes, and endurance game and an arcade style game. The object of Colors is simply to form lines of four blocks or more of the same color. Pieces, which consist of 3 blocks are randomly picked and then descend, Tetris-style. The larger the lines you form, the more points you get.
